1a0524eb-45bb-491f-9e4b-1c3178de3de5.title: Checkout Conversion AB Test
1a0524eb-45bb-491f-9e4b-1c3178de3de5.content:
## Variant A – Control

- Current 3-step flow:
  1. Shipping address
  2. Shipping method
  3. Payment & review
- Order summary is only visible on the last step.
- “Complete order” button is below the fold on smaller screens.
- No explicit trust badges or security copy.

## Variant B – Simplified Layout

Goal: reduce friction and clicks.

Changes:

- Collapse from **3 steps → 2 steps**:
  - Step 1: Shipping address + shipping method
  - Step 2: Payment + order review
- Always show a **sticky order summary** on the right (desktop) or at the bottom (mobile).
- Autofill address fields when data is available from profile.
- Show shipping cost and estimated total as the user edits their address and shipping method.
- “Complete order” button:
  - High-contrast gradient (brand pink → blue)
  - Always above the fold on 1024px height and above.

fb2ccd0d-2c46-4a90-9b7b-e01f30b01f51.title: Price compare AB test
fb2ccd0d-2c46-4a90-9b7b-e01f30b01f51.content:
On our ecommerce site, users can see the price of the product they’re viewing, but:

- They **cannot easily compare** it with similar products without going back to the category page or search results.
- Session recordings show users:
  - Bounce back and forth between multiple tabs
  - Abandon when they feel unsure if they’re getting a good deal
- Customer interviews mention:
  - “I’m not sure if this is the best option for me.”
  - “I end up checking 3–4 similar products before deciding.”

We want to test whether adding an **inline price comparison widget** on the product detail page (PDP) will help users decide faster and increase add-to-cart and purchase rates.

Primary metric:
- **PDP Purchase Conversion**  
  `purchases / PDP_sessions` for the tested products

df26a4f5-2310-4254-b28f-15c04900c004.title: Price compare AB test
df26a4f5-2310-4254-b28f-15c04900c004.content:
Secondary metrics:
- Add-to-cart rate from PDP
- Click-through rate (CTR) on the price compare widget
- Time spent on PDP (we expect a **small increase or stable**, not a big spike)

Variant A – Control (No Price Compare Widget)
- Standard product detail page:
  - Main product image, title, price, reviews, description
  - “Similar products” shown **only** in the carousel at the very bottom

Variant B – Price Compare Widget (Treatment)
**New feature:** a compact **price compare module** just below the main price.
